methodBody: .  _ log . error (  (  " Portal   class   loader   is   not   available   to   override   the    "     +     " default   Catalina   web   class   loader "  )  )  ;
Arrays . sort ( files ,    new   StringComparator ( true ,    true )  )  ;
.  _ log . debug (  (  (  " Sort    "     +     ( files . length )  )     +     "    files "  )  )  ;
for    ( int   i    =     0  ;    i    <     ( files . length )  ;    i +  +  )     {
.  _ log . debug ( StringBundler . concat (  " File    "  ,    String . valueOf ( i )  ,     "     "  ,    files [ i ]  )  )  ;
